ml_tags: Shirley Mavis Staker Aged 91Years Born 7th July 1927  Passed 11th October 2020 (Nee Carlaw) Not for just a year, but Always With a love that's true,Always A  Special Lady with a Beautiful Voice I'll be lovin' you Always When the things you've planned need a helpin' hand I will understand Always,Always Days may not be fair Always That's when I'll be there Always Not for just an hour, not for just a day Loved & Loving Mother, Mother-In-Law, Grand-Mother & Great Grand-Mother
